column4: On ubuntu 10.04, my wireless connection keeps disconnecting after like 4 minutes, i've reloaded the wireless module to the kernel, then it disconnects again, returning error, " ERROR!!! RTMPCancelTimer failed, Timer hasn't been initialize !, rt_ioctl_giwscan. 2(2) BSS returned, data->length = 312 , ==>rt_ioctl_siwfreq::SIOCSIWFREQ[cmd=0x8b04] (channel=6) ", any comment ?
is this a netgear USB wifi device ?
no it's a builtin wirless card in MSI U100
